description: Removes the game server from a game server group. As a result of this operation, the deregistered game server can no longer be claimed and will not be returned in a list of active game servers. To deregister a game server, specify the game server group and game server ID. If successful, this operation emits a CloudWatch event with termination timestamp and reason. Amazon GameLift FleetIQ Guide.

parameters.name: GameServerGroupName
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the game server group where the game server is running.

parameters.name: GameServerId
parameters.description: A custom string that uniquely identifies the game server to deregister.
